sentences.sContent: An infinitive is a two-word form of a verb.
sentences.sContent_eng: An infinitive is a two-word form of a verb.
sentences.sCn: 一个不定式是由两个词构成的形式。

words.tran: 无限的，无穷的；无数的；极大的
无限；[数] 无穷大；无限的东西（如空间，时间）

trans.tranOther: in grammar, the basic form of a verb, used with ‘to’ in English. In the sentence ‘I want to watch television.’ ‘to watch’ is an infinitive.
